SEARCH

程序包 com.se.aiconomy.server.langchain.service.chat

package com.se.aiconomy.server.langchain.service.chat
  • 类
    说明
    Assistant
    The Assistant interface defines methods for interacting with an AI assistant using text prompts.
    Chain
    The Chain class extends BaseChain and provides methods to interact with OpenAI chat models for both synchronous and streaming chat functionalities.
    ChatService
    ChatService provides methods to interact with AI chat models, supporting both synchronous and streaming chat functionalities.
    Prompt
    The Prompt class provides localized prompt templates for an intelligent financial assistant.
    Tools
    Provides tools for interacting with user financial data, such as transactions and budgets.
